fields.title: Classic Pancakes
fields.description: Fluffy, golden pancakes perfect for breakfast
fields.instructions: Mix dry ingredients in one bowl, wet in another. Combine gently, cook on griddle until bubbles form.

fields.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: Traditional Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
fields.instructions: Cook pasta al dente. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine with hot pasta and crispy pancetta.

fields.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
fields.description: Crispy on the outside, chewy on the inside chocolate chip cookies
fields.instructions: Cream butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour mixture. Fold in chocolate chips and bake.
